phrase.cizu_name: on a wing and a prayer

jx.jx_en_mean: with only the slightest chance of success
used suggest happiness by reference to the light movement or feeling of flying
jx.jx_cn_mean: 飞一般地；飘飘然；轻松愉快地

lj.lj_ly: ‘I'm on wings,’ she admitted. ‘It's wonderful seeing the palace brightened up.’.
lj.lj_ls: “我觉得飘飘然，”她承认道。“看到整个王宫都活跃起来真是太棒了”。

phrase.cizu_name: spread (或 stretch 或 try) one's wings

jx.jx_en_mean: extend one's activities and interests or start new ones
jx.jx_cn_mean: 扩展某人的活动和利益；重新开始

jx.jx_en_mean: in or into one's protective care

jx.jx_en_mean: In the stage wings, unseen by the audience.

lj.lj_ly: a presidential candidate waiting in the wings.

jx.jx_en_mean: Under one's protection; in one's care.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 在…庇护下；在某人照顾之下

jx.jx_en_mean: To say or do something without preparation, forethought, or sufficient information or experience; improvise

lj.lj_ly: She hadn't studied for the exam, so she decided to wing it.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (originally in the plural): from Old Norse vængir, plural of vængr

encyclopedia.content: winGMicrosoft WinG老游戏常用组件 如孔明传，等一系列的95年左右的游戏。 个人简介 姓名：Kim Heon Woo，金宪宇 出生：1986年 团队：Jinjo Crew，7 Commandos 兴趣：看电影 成就及荣誉 Wing是2008年Red Bull BC One的卫冕冠军，2009年他来到了纽约城，想要 继续他的辉煌。 从业经历 自初中时第一次看见breaking起，他已经跳了近十年。他的哥哥Skim对他的影响最大。他看着Skim从基础开始一点一点练习，这使他成就了今日的自己。对

entry.def: The wings of a bird or insect are the two parts of its body that it uses for flying.

example.ex: The bird flapped its wings furiously...
She saw the occasional glimmer of a moth's wings.
example.tran: 她看见蛾子的翅膀偶尔会泛光。

entry.def: The wings of an aeroplane are the long flat parts sticking out of its side which support it while it is flying.
A wing of a building is a part of it which sticks out from the main part.

example.ex: We were given an office in the empty west wing.
example.tran: 给我们在空置的大楼西翼分了一间办公室。

example.ex: ...in the Child Psychiatry wing of London's Royal Free Hospital.
example.tran: 在伦敦皇家自由医院配楼的儿童精神病部

entry.def: A wing of an organization, especially a political organization, is a group within it which has a particular function or particular beliefs.

example.ex: ...the military wing of the African National Congress.
example.tran: 非洲国民大会的武装派

example.ex: ...the liberal wing of the Democratic Party.

entry.tran: (舞台两侧用帘幕或布景遮住的)边厢,翼部,侧面
entry.def: In a theatre, the wings are the sides of the stage which are hidden from the audience by curtains or scenery.

example.ex: Most nights I watched the start of the play from the wings.
example.tran: 大多数晚上我都是在边厢观看戏剧的开场。

entry.tran: (足球、曲棍球等的)边锋位置；边锋
entry.def: In a game such as football or hockey, the left wing and the right wing are the areas on the far left and the far right of the pitch. You can also refer to the players who play in these positions as the left wing and the right wing .
A wing of a car is a part of it on the outside which is over one of the wheels.

entry.tran: 飞机驾驶资格；飞行资格
entry.def: When pilots get their wings, they become qualified to fly aeroplanes.

example.ex: He had no sooner got his wings than the Korean conflict broke out.
example.tran: 他刚获得飞行资格，朝鲜战争就爆发了。

entry.def: If you say that something or someone wings their way somewhere or wings somewhere, you mean that they go there quickly, especially by plane.

example.ex: A few moments later they were airborne and winging their way south...
example.tran: 过了一会儿，他们已然搭上飞机赶往南方了。

example.ex: A cash bonanza will be winging its way to the 600,000 members of the scheme...
example.tran: 该方案的60万成员很快将获得一次发财的机会。

entry.def: If you say that something or someone clips your wings, you mean that they restrict your freedom to do what you want.

example.ex: ...legislation aimed at clipping the president's political wings.
example.tran: 旨在从政治上限制总统的立法

entry.def: If you say that someone is waiting in the wings, you mean that they are ready and waiting for an opportunity to take action.

example.ex: There are now more than 20 big companies waiting in the wings to take over some of its business.
example.tran: 现有20多家大公司随时准备接手其部分业务。

entry.def: If you spread your wings, you do something new and rather difficult or move to a new place, because you feel more confident in your abilities than you used to and you want to gain wider experience.

example.ex: I led a very confined life in my village so I suppose that I wanted to spread my wings.
example.tran: 我在村里生活很封闭，所以我想出去闯荡一番。

entry.tran: 将…置于羽翼之下；对…呵护有加
entry.def: If you take someone under your wing, you look after them, help them, and protect them.

example.ex: Her boss took her under his wing after fully realizing her potential.
example.tran: 老板充分意识到她的潜力后，对她关怀备至。

means.word_mean: 1. a movable organ for flying (one of a pair)
2. one of the horizontal airfoils on either side of the fuselage of an airplane
3. a stage area out of sight of the audience
5. the side of military or naval formation;
6. a hockey player stationed in a forward positin on either side

sentences.sentence: "he preferred the drumsticks to the wings"

means.word_mean: 8. a barrier that surrounds the wheels of a vehicle to block splashing water or mud;

sentences.sentence: "in England they call a fender a wing"

means.word_mean: 9. an addition that extends a main building
1. travel through the air; be airborne;

Sentence.sentence: They have strong wings capable of flying long distances.

sentences.en: The plane's wings are very long.
He belongs to the radical wing of the party.
An eagle winged its way across the valley.

jushi.english: The nearside wing was damaged in the collision.
jushi.chinese: 汽车碰撞时左侧的翼子板撞坏了。

jushi.english: She stood watching the performance from the wings.
jushi.chinese: 她站在舞台的侧面观看演出。
